data.instruction: Configure one external integration/channel and verify sync state + external id linkage is persisted.
data.expectedResult: Connector installation/configuration and sync status are queryable for operational debugging.

error.message: You are not a member of this biz.
You are not a member of this biz.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Delivery status and logs". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

requestBody.title: Owner validates financial/reporting outputs API Trace

data.instruction: Create an offer representing the UC primary service; choose execution mode matching the scenario.
data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "SMS providers (Twilio, MessageBird)". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: As biz member, list bookings and progress one booking through operational status updates.
data.expectedResult: Authorized role can update status while preserving auditability and lifecycle consistency.

data.instruction: Update offer publish/lifecycle flags so customer actors can discover it.
data.expectedResult: Offer appears as published/active and can be returned in customer-facing list queries.
